bug.author: dosovits
bug.summary: Agent drives through a fence in Town 1
bug.description: The agent car drives through a wooden fence with bushes. See a picture attached. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8037948/32341877-09ada28a-bfff-11e7-8ea3-43e8a1d308a4.jpg></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TheNihilisticRobot>@TheNihilisticRobot</denchmark-link> This is actually a recurrent issue. The meshes based on a spline (fences, some walls) lose their collider from time to time. It needs to be set again in the editor.
This specific case is resolved in 0.6, the general bug is already reported <denchmark-link:https://github.com/carla-simulator/carla/issues/35>#35</denchmark-link>
